ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Umm... easy on the mana...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Heh.  Now that large portions of LGuk and SolB are green to me, I ve found Screech to be pretty good for crowd control.  When I start a train, I m
ygData.messageBody:
On Sun, 26 Mar 2000, Lyrnia Jongleur wrote:
>
> > I used to use it a LOT on test to get things off the evac'er.
> > I figure I died about 50% of the time but at least the party got out.
>
> Gimme a break, it's not that useful. That's what your L26 song does.
>
> It's a different way of doing it ;) And it's fun ;) Besides. What else
> are we going to use it for :)

Heh. Now that large portions of LGuk and SolB are green to
me, I've found Screech to be pretty good for crowd
control. When I start a train, I'm routinely stopping at the
zone, warning everyone there that a train is coming, and
waiting until everyone gets out, all the while using Screech
to delay the inevitable.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
